password_invalid_hint: Please fill in the password field
delete_dialog_title: Are you sure you want to delete this @element?
delete_dialog_message: You can re-save the credentials at a later time
save_dialog_title: Do you wish to save the user?
save_dialog_message: This will allow you to log in faster on your next session
name: name
health_questionnaire_greeting:
Dear @role:
Due to the pandemic, please fill out the following questionnaire:
health_questionnaire_question_has_travel: Have you travel to another city or country in the last 14 days?
health_questionnaire_question_where_trav: What countries or cities have you visited in the last 14 days?
health_questionnaire_description: Questionnaire of risk factors identification in travelers
health_questionnaire_question_has_contac: Have you been in contact with a confirmed case of COVID-19?
health_questionnaire_question_when_conta: Indicate the date you were in contact with the COVID-19 case
health_questionnaire_question_major_symp: Do you have any of the following major symptoms?
health_questionnaire_question_minor_symp: Do you have any of the following minor symptoms?
answered_today: Today you have already answered the questionnaire
empty_posts: There are currently no @element to show
try_again: Try again in a few moments
remaining_credits: You are @remaining credits away from graduation
empty_subjects: There are no subjects to show in this section
archives_web_consult: View the original digital files on the desktop platform
unselected_balance: Click the lower right button to choose a balance
empty_movements: No movements to show in this balance
amount_hint: Click me to select a balance
invalid_user_hint: Please enter a valid user credential
balance_hint: Click me to select a balance
server_disconnection_title: At the moment we are having trouble handling your request, we are working on it
user_disconnection_title: Oops, something is wrong with your network
list_server_disconnection_content:
Unable to connect to the server
We are working on it
list_user_disconnection_content:
No internet connection
Check your connection and try again
user_disconnection_subtitle: Check your connection and try again
logout_message: Do you really wish to logout?
traveling_description: Description of the reason for traveling
exit_application: Do you wish to close the app?
international_vacation_warning: Stop! To travel outside Mexico frontiers, you MUST buy a travel insurance. Whithout the insurance, the institution it is not responsible for any accident during your vacation time!
isSuspect: Is suspect. Must contact your coordinator for more information on how to proceed with your possible health condition.
noInformation: It has no return information. Must contact your coordinator.
noArrivalDate: It is foreign and has no return date. Must contact your coordinator.
noResponsiveLetter: To continue, you must submit your Responsive Letter on your academic portal. Consult your coordinator for more information about this process.
delete_all_notifications: Do you want to remove all read notifications?
health_questionnaire_thanks: Thank you for answering, keep following the sanitary rules.
update_available_description: There is a new version available, please update your app
success data: Your data has been succesfuly updated
evaluation services: Your opinions are very important for Us
